Reviews.Title: AWSOME CAMERA
Reviews.Author: darren kirkman
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pics (even in total darkness)..zoom n everything works great..just learn how to use the different modes..highly recomended.takes great video..ps get at least 2800+ rechargable batteries..

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: rafael
Reviews.Content: I like it because it provided all information necessary for the company to purchase my fresh move to my country

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 12 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video - Red (import, backed by Hot Deals Electronics 1 year guarantee)
4 AA High Capacity 2950mah Batteries with Rapid Charger - Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets, & Neck Strap
32 Gigabyte SDHC (Secure Digital High Capacity) Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader -  Universal Memory Card Wallet
Full Size 50" Tripod w/case - HDMI Cable for High Definition TV connection - Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - Quality Fiber Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens & HD Video - Red (Import) + 4 AA High Capacity Batteries with Charger + 10pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
